plot: The travels of a Las Vegas headliner are followed as he searches for undiscovered talent and a possible opening act for his show at the Quad Resort and Casino.
title: Vegas Strip Search
plot_es: The travels of a Las Vegas headliner are followed as he searches for undiscovered talent and a possible opening act for his show at the Quad Resort and Casino.
plot_en: The travels of a Las Vegas headliner are followed as he searches for undiscovered talent and a possible opening act for his show at the Quad Resort and Casino.
